result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ
result.translation: Ibyo (Allah yategetse; ni byo umuntu ategetswe kubahiriza),[1] kandi uwubahirije imigenzo ya Allah, mu by’ukuri ni bimwe mu bituma imitima igandukira (Allah).
result.footnotes: [1] Ibyo Allah yategetse bivugwa muri uyu murongo ni ibyo yategetse mu mirongo yatambutse ya 27, 28, 29, 30, 31
